#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int arr[31]={1024,1024,1024,466737221,466737221,904322927,904322927,953349816,953349816,
    953349816,953349816,987910553,987910553,996023990,996023990,996023990,996023990,954477993,
    954477993,954477993,954477993,946217050,946217050,946217050,946217050,963309598,963309598,
    963309598,963309598,947206243,947206243};
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		cout<<arr[n]<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
